encodes.from sentence: Our model encodes the dependency structure over the input sentence with efficient graph convolution operations, then extracts entity-centric representations to make robust relation predictions.

extracts.from sentence: Our model encodes the dependency structure over the input sentence with efficient graph convolution operations, then extracts entity-centric representations to make robust relation predictions.

novel path-centric pruning technique.to remove: irrelevant information from the tree while maximally keeping relevant content

apply.from sentence: We also apply a novel path-centric pruning technique to remove irrelevant information from the tree while maximally keeping relevant content, which further improves the performance of several dependency-based models including ours.
